titles.title: A bill to authorize the award of the Medal of Honor to James C. McCloughan for acts of valor during the Vietnam War.
A bill to authorize the award of the Medal of Honor to James C. McCloughan for acts of valor during the Vietnam War.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: This bill authorizes the President to award the Medal of Honor to James C. McCloughan for acts of valor during the Vietnam War for which he was previously awarded the Bronze Star Medal with "V" Device.
